reviews.text: We stayed here after a very long flight fom the UK, very easy to find, only a short walk to the city centre. We had a two bedroom apartment which was very spacious. Place was clean and well equipped and had a lovely large spa bath. Off street parking was great and it was very quiet even though it was off a busy-ish road.
reviews.title: Really good family accomodation

reviews.text: Stayed here with a friend and her 2 children. Absolutely awesome 2brm accommodation! Very spacious and everything beautifully clean and maintained, including super fluffy towels and nice linen. Units are serviced daily. Found it to be very quiet and handy to the city.
reviews.title: Excellent family accommodation
